Package com.jpmc.theater

Class Showing

java.lang.Object
com.jpmc.theater.Showing
public class Showing extends Object
This class represents the movie showing object. Each movie showing has a movie, sequence of the day, and show start time field. This class also formats the start time of the show into a more easily readable String format as well as comparing sequences of showings.
Author:
Ray Wang
